e="preserve">Roger Simons (1927 – July 2020) was a Belgian journalist, reporter and correspondent. Simons was the correspondent of the BRT, (later named BRTN and VRT) between 1961 and 2002. He was also the correspondent for the Dutch newspaper "Leidsche Courant".
He retired in 1992.. He became an Officer of the Order of Leopold III after his retirement in 1992. He was born in Antwerp, Belgium.
Simons died in London in July 2020, aged 93.
